description: Students explore dance genres that embody a strong rhythmic foundation.  They experience rhythmic
pattern as an organizing principle for the human body, an expressive capacity, and a social
connector.  Students investigate the cultural and social milieu from which dance genres emerge.
Dance genres could include, hip hop, African, Asian, and Caribbean dance forms, tap dance, or jazz
dance.  May be repeated. P/N only. Offered each semester.
